rules_text:
Scavenge costs you pay cost {B}{G} less to activate.
Whenever you exile another creature card from your graveyard, create a 1/1 green Druid creature token.
Scavenge {1}{B}{G} [i]({1}{B}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)[/i]
